Row.Text: Every map is unique. Generates Earth-like continents with fractal coastlines, scattered archipelagos, and asymmetric landmass sizes. Parameters randomized each game for maximum replayability.
Controls how human and AI players are distributed across continents and hemispheres.
Human players spawn in the same hemisphere. Standard Civilization behavior for team-based play.
All players are randomly distributed across all continents and hemispheres. Maximum unpredictability for competitive multiplayer.
Each player starts on their own continent when possible. Encourages naval expansion and exploration.
